entries.meaning: A machine with sharp rotating blades in a bowl, for mashing, crushing, or liquefying food ingredients.
(theater) A piece of fabric sewn into the front of a theatrical wig to make it blend in with the performer's natural hair.
examples: A blender is added to a wig in the same way that a quick front is added. It can be added at the same time as the fronting lace is added or after the wig is completed.

entries.meaning: (quilting) A subtly patterned fabric printed in different shades of a single color, often used in place of a solid to create visual texture.
